data.name: Heat and Run
data.detailed_description:
Join our discord


About the Game

Heat and Run is a 2D multiplayer shooter, strategic and frantic!

Choose a hero/heroine and equip them with a potent relic. Master your special skills and the block's creation during intense 4v4 battles. Use your Glocktail and Dynameats to destroy your opponent's Flame!

Dominate with your team by creating effective strategies. Create synergies with your heroes, organize your defense and coordinate your assaults! Even if your gaming skill is important, communication with your allies is the key to victory.


  • 8 heroes.
  • A gorgeous Map.
  • A fast-paced 4v4 gameplay.
  • 3 servers: Europe, North America, South America.


  • 12 heroes.
  • 30 Relics (defensive, offensive, utilitarian / solo or teamplay)
  • 3 Maps and a Tutorial.
  • New modes: custom, spectator and ranked.
  • Friends and teams system.
  • Xp and gold to progress in the game.
  • Bots filling empty games.
  • Cosmetics to be the most stylish on the battlefield.


  • Created by a small team that listens to its community.
  • An accessible game for small configurations and anywhere in the world.
  • FPS or MOBA players, let yourself be surprised by the strategy necessary to triumph in Heat and Run!

If you are interested in the game, don’t forget to add it to your wishlist! ♥

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1225790/Heat_and_Run/

data.short_description: Heat and Run is a 2D multiplayer shooter, strategic and frantic! Take on players from around the world in 4vs4 battles: Select a hero with unique skills, master the creation of Blocks in intense battles and destroy the opponent Flame to win the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
